title: Update: Sarasota death ruled homicide by gunshot wound
content:
SARASOTA -- The Sarasota County Sheriff's Office has classified the death of David Morse, 48, as a homicide caused by a gunshot wound.
Morse was found dead in the front yard of a home in the 2400 block of 47th Street in Sarasota around 10 a.m. on Monday.
No further information is being released at this time. The sheriff's office says it will provide updates “as they become available.”
Detectives are asking anyone with information to contact the Criminal Investigations Section at (941) 861-4900, or submit an anonymous tip through Crime Stoppers of Sarasota County by calling (941) 366-TIPS.
